text:
Hello,
I see that the company insight information is auto filled after few moments only. I need this data right after I create a company via api. The response I get from company create api doesnt contain this insights data.
Is there any API to get company insight data using company domain?
I am looking for no of employee form insights data.

Thanks in advance

Hello, sorry if someone already reported this issue in another channel, but we were getting lot of the errors when trying to fetch workflow via API, error that we received for long time was `FLOW_READ_TEAM_PERMISSION_DENIED`. Did anyone else faced the same issue today?
Again, if there's another channel for reporting issues, please let me know, thanks. :pray:

Hi, I'm new in using HubSpot. I'm trying to integrate HubSpot in an application. I've installed this library <https://github.com/MadKudu/node-HubSpot|MadKudu/node-HubSpot>. When I tried using it, I've encountered an error (see screebshot). Has anyone used the same library and experienced the issue? Any suggestions on how to fix it? Thank you!

Related issue: <https://github.com/MadKudu/node-HubSpot/issues/279>
